languages.text: "Когда нечестивцы обрушились на нас, мы дали им достойный отпор. Враг обратился в бегство, и мое подразделение решительно погнало их прочь к кораблям. Наш бросок вбил клин в их наступающую волну и сорвал нашествие, но мы оказались отрезаны от флангов и угодили в окружение. Несколько часов мы доблестно сражались в окружении, не давая вражеским порядкам сомкнуться для нового натиска, но затем боеприпасы подошли к концу".

"When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counter-attack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."
languages.original_text: "Когда нечестивцы обрушились на нас, мы дали им достойный отпор. Враг обратился в бегство, и мое подразделение решительно погнало их прочь к кораблям. Наш бросок вбил клин в их наступающую волну и сорвал нашествие, но мы оказались отрезаны от флангов и угодили в окружение. Несколько часов мы доблестно сражались в окружении, не давая вражеским порядкам сомкнуться для нового натиска, но затем боеприпасы подошли к концу".

We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “当那些亵渎者冲过来的时候，我们没有给他们任何机会。我的部队击溃了敌人，把他们赶回到了他们的飞船上。我们的反击就像楔子一样敲进了敌方的阵地，阻止了他们的入侵，但我们的侧翼也被敌人切断了。随后，我们的部队被敌人包围。我们英勇地战斗了好几个小时，击退了敌人一波又一波的攻击……到最后，我们弹尽粮绝了。”
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counterattack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: “当那些亵渎者冲过来的时候，我们没有给他们任何机会。我的部队击溃了敌人，把他们赶回到了他们的飞船上。我们的反击就像楔子一样敲进了敌方的阵地，阻止了他们的入侵，但我们的侧翼也被敌人切断了。随后，我们的部队被敌人包围。我们英勇地战斗了好几个小时，击退了敌人一波又一波的攻击……到最后，我们弹尽粮绝了。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「冒涜者たちと対峙したとき、容赦なく対抗しました。敵は敗走し、私の部隊は奴らを船まで追い返しました。我々の反撃は進軍する敵の大群に歯止めをかけて、侵攻を阻止しましたが、結果的に包囲されてしまいました。新たな戦闘に向けて敵が再編成するのを阻止するために、数時間にわたり果敢に戦いましたが…予備の弾薬まで使い果たしてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counterattack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: 「冒涜者たちと対峙したとき、容赦なく対抗しました。敵は敗走し、私の部隊は奴らを船まで追い返しました。我々の反撃は進軍する敵の大群に歯止めをかけて、侵攻を阻止しましたが、結果的に包囲されてしまいました。新たな戦闘に向けて敵が再編成するのを阻止するために、数時間にわたり果敢に戦いましたが…予備の弾薬まで使い果たしてしまいました」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Cuando los profanadores cayeron sobre nosotros, no les mostramos ninguna piedad. Rechazamos al enemigo; mi unidad lo mandó de vuelta a sus naves. Nuestro contraataque detuvo el avance de su horda y puso fin a la invasión, pero eso también supuso que nos interceptaran por ambos flancos y nos rodearan. Luchamos con valor durante horas para evitar que las filas enemigas se reagruparan para una nueva masacre... hasta que se agotaron nuestras reservas de munición».
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counter-attack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los profanadores cayeron sobre nosotros, no les mostramos ninguna piedad. Rechazamos al enemigo; mi unidad lo mandó de vuelta a sus naves. Nuestro contraataque detuvo el avance de su horda y puso fin a la invasión, pero eso también supuso que nos interceptaran por ambos flancos y nos rodearan. Luchamos con valor durante horas para evitar que las filas enemigas se reagruparan para una nueva masacre... hasta que se agotaron nuestras reservas de munición».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counterattack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

languages.text: « Quand les profanateurs ont fondu sur nous, nous n'avons pas fait de quartier. Nous avons mis les ennemis en déroute et mon unité les a même repoussés jusqu'à leurs vaisseaux. Notre contre-attaque nous a permis de faire une percée et de contrecarrer l'invasion, mais nous nous sommes retrouvés en plein cœur de leurs lignes, cernés de tous les côtés. Nous avons lutté pendant des heures pour les empêcher de se regrouper... mais nous avons fini par nous retrouver à court de munitions. »
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counter-attack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: « Quand les profanateurs ont fondu sur nous, nous n'avons pas fait de quartier. Nous avons mis les ennemis en déroute et mon unité les a même repoussés jusqu'à leurs vaisseaux. Notre contre-attaque nous a permis de faire une percée et de contrecarrer l'invasion, mais nous nous sommes retrouvés en plein cœur de leurs lignes, cernés de tous les côtés. Nous avons lutté pendant des heures pour les empêcher de se regrouper... mais nous avons fini par nous retrouver à court de munitions. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Als die Gotteslästerer uns angriffen, gewährten wir ihnen keine Gnade. Der Feind wurde aufgehalten, und meine Einheit trieb sie zurück zu ihren Schiffen. Unser Gegenangriff trieb einen Keil in ihre vorstoßende Horde und beendete die Invasion, aber das bedeutete auch, dass wir an beiden Flanken abgeschnitten und eingekesselt wurden. Wir schlugen uns mehrere Stunden lang wacker, damit die gegnerischen Reihen sich nicht zu einem neuen Vorstoß sammeln konnten ... doch dann ging uns die Munition aus."
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counter-attack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Gotteslästerer uns angriffen, gewährten wir ihnen keine Gnade. Der Feind wurde aufgehalten, und meine Einheit trieb sie zurück zu ihren Schiffen. Unser Gegenangriff trieb einen Keil in ihre vorstoßende Horde und beendete die Invasion, aber das bedeutete auch, dass wir an beiden Flanken abgeschnitten und eingekesselt wurden. Wir schlugen uns mehrere Stunden lang wacker, damit die gegnerischen Reihen sich nicht zu einem neuen Vorstoß sammeln konnten ... doch dann ging uns die Munition aus."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Kâfirler üzerimize akın ettiğinde merhamet göstermedik. Düşman dağıldı, birimim de onları gemilerine kadar kovaladı. Karşı saldırımız, ilerleyen güruhlarını köşeye sıkıştırıp işgallerini önledi. Fakat bu, kanatları boşalttığımız ve çevremizin sarıldığı anlamına geliyordu. Düşmanların yeni bir saldırıya geçmemesi için saatler boyu cesurca savaştık... Ta ki elimizdeki tüm cephane tükenene kadar."
languages.original_text: "When the profaners descended upon us, we gave them no quarter. The enemy was routed, and my unit drove them back to their ships. Our counter-attack drove a wedge into their advancing horde and thwarted the invasion, but it also meant that we were cut off on both flanks and surrounded. We fought valiantly for several hours to stop the enemy ranks from reforming for a new onslaught... until we depleted our munitions reserves."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler üzerimize geldiğinde onlara hiç merhamet etmedik. Düşmanı dağıttık ve birimim onları gemilerine geri yolladı. Karşı saldırımız ilerleyen güruhlarını köşeye sıkıştırdı ve istilalarını önledi. Fakat bu, bizim de iki cepheden ayrıldığımız ve çevremizin sarıldığı anlamına geliyordu. Düşmanların yeni bir saldırıya geçmemesi için saatler boyu cesurca savaştık... Ta ki cephane rezervlerimiz tükenene kadar."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
